document_data.name: Raven Remahr
document_data.mainbody:
'''Raven Remahr''' was a mage who settled in the [[Realm of Fire]] in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

A fearless mage, Raven Remahr sought to tame or master the powerful flame that burned in the Realm of Fire. The leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]], who fought to unify the wartorn Utter East through conquest, could not allow this, and faced Raven in a [[bloodforge]] battle.
